name: GitTools
author: internetwache
description: A repository with 3 tools for pwn'ing websites with .git repositories available

name: gitjacker
author: liamg
description: Leak git repositories from misconfigured websites

name: git-dumper
author: arthaud
description: A tool to dump a git repository from a website

name: GitHunter
author: digininja
description: A tool for searching a Git repository for interesting content

name: dvcs-ripper
author: kost
description: Rip web accessible (distributed) version control systems: SVN/GIT/HG...
